text: Lamberto Leonardi (8 August 1939 – 22 February 2021) was an Italian professional footballer and coach. He was born in Rome. He played as a midfielder. Leonardi's playing career lasted from 1958 until 1973. He later managed football clubs from 1974 until 2001. He played for Varese Calcio S.S.D. eighty-six times between 1966 until 1969. He also managed A.S.G. Nocerina. Leonardi died on 22 February 2021 in Latina, Italy at the age of 81.Il calcio piange Bebo Leonardi: allenò la Salernitana nel 1980 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Rome Category:Italian football managers
title: Lamberto Leonardi
